dark_mode.dark: Currently using dark theme. Click once if you want to switch to light theme or twice if you want to automatically use your computer's light/dark theme.
dark_mode.light: Light theme is currently in use. Click twice if you want to switch to dark theme or click once if you want to automatically use your computer's light/dark theme.
dark_mode.auto: Your computer is currently using the light/dark theme. Click once if you want to switch to the dark theme or twice if you want to use the light theme.
